People lost $10 billion to scams\nin 2023, according to the FTC.
In 1986, the very first computer\nvirus was made. It was a boot \nsector virus called 'Brain'.
250,000 computer viruses are\nregistered every single day of the year.
67% of ransomware attempts in the \nUS involved some form of phishing.
Some scammers use AI to clone\nvoices of loved ones to get\nmoney from you.
